author: p0W3RH311
body:
Hi Guys !!

Get-childitem is awesome but it miss context view with adding colors and icons to distinguish the files and directory. also it miss a tree view with level to this tree fo example:

```
PS> ls -treeview <uint> -icon <switch> -autoColor <switch>

PS> ls -treeView 2 -icon -autoColor
```

![Sans titre](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36144546/117658121-371b4980-b14f-11eb-9742-4a1e70ef607f.png)

![treeview](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/36144546/117658136-3edaee00-b14f-11eb-87d8-c4217736db45.png)

comments.author: ShrykeWindgrace
comments.body: "Icons and colors" part is partially addressed by the `Terminal-Icons` plugin, if I recall correctly.

title: add colors, icons and tree view with get-childitem
